Purchase Method:: 15 kV voltage class medium-voltage circuit breaker, outdoor, free-standing, dead-tank design, comprised of three (3) group-operated poles, with a common stored-energy operating mechanism, operating at a maximum voltage of 15.5 kV in a non-coastal environment up to 3,300-feet. See Technical Specifications.
